title: Citizen

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Invite yourself at an authorized's target house. You will learn one non-authorized player that visits them. You will learn one player your target visits, authorized or not.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you die, the invited player will learn the name of your attacker.
-If your target dies, you will learn the name of their attacker.
